title: Tstaffor's Isolated Containment Terminal
content:

You can check out more of my work here:
[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/tstaffor-s-author-page Tstaffor's Isolated Containment Terminal]

[[tabview]]
[[tab introduction]]
[[=image tstaffor_intro.png width="1000px" ]]
[[/tab]]
[[tab SCP]]
[[=]]
++ [[[SCP-6557]]] - Annihilation from a Cross Across Time
[[module ListPages name="SCP-6557"]]
++ **[##Green|+%%rating%%##]**
[[/module]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Commentary â–¡" hide="â–£ Commentary â–£"]]
This started out as an Imposter Challenge of Placeholder's work, but as it went on it definitely morphed more into my patented "series of no-dialogue logs" style scip.

This is currently the article on this site I'm absolutely the proudest of.  Other than a slight change to the final log, this was the first draft that I wrote all in one go!
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Reviews â–¡" hide="â–£ Reviews â–£"]]
[[<]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
do not fuck with them ants man
[[>]]
- [[*user Starch Tuber]]
[[/>]]
----
ah, I can tell by O5-11's email that they're a person of culture
[[>]]
- [[*user loddite]]
[[/>]]
----
This is fun
[[>]]
- [[*user Grigori Karpin]]
[[/>]]
[[/div]]
[[/<]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

----

[[=]]
++ [[[SCP-5846]]] - The One-Stop Shop
[[module ListPages name="SCP-5846"]]
++ **[##Green|+%%rating%%##]**
[[/module]]

[[collapsible show="â–¡ Commentary â–¡" hide="â–£ Commentary â–£"]]
This was the first draft I ever wrote. It goes without saying that it was //not// good, but I came back to it and fixed it up quite a bit and now it's currently my favorite thing I've written and what I'm most proud of!

This also has an extended [[[experiment-log-5846|Experiment Log]]]. It's pretty exciting to see others take my idea and add to it in such creative ways!
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Reviews â–¡" hide="â–£ Reviews â–£"]]
[[<]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
fuckin weird. i love it
[[>]]
- [[*user lavenderbloodstains]]
[[/>]]
----
I've always been a fan of "table" style SCPs that give a list of weird shit.
[[>]]
- [[*user fabledtiefling]]
[[/>]]
----
This is amazing. I love the concept and the way you played it out. Your characterization of both the store and agent Taylor was great. And the bits about mini golf and the funeral parlor made me chuckle. This was a great read.
[[>]]
- [[*user EmperorRaccoon]]
[[/>]]
----
Between this and the food court article, you obviously have a certain level of skill for linguistic turns. The possessive twist is really clever, and wordplay such as Ghoti/Goatee is something I personally find quite difficult to come up with.
[[>]]
- [[*user Dysadron]]
[[/>]]
[[/div]]
[[/<]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

----

[[=]]
++ [[[SCP-6547]]] - Worlds Within Worlds Within Worlds...
[[module ListPages name="SCP-6547"]]
++ **[##Green|+%%rating%%##]**
[[/module]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Commentary â–¡" hide="â–£ Commentary â–£"]]
This is an adaptation of an AI-generated prompt! I created it from the following generated text:
[[div class="blockquote"]]
Item #: SCP-XXXX

Object Class: Keter

Special Containment Procedures: SCP-XXXX is to be contained in a standard Locked Secure Container as Site-â–ˆâ–ˆ. No personnel are to enter SCP-XXXX's container without Level 4 clearance.

Description: SCP-XXXX is a small, black cube with a singular red button on one face. SCP-XXXX was recovered from the office of Dr. â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ after an incident in which [DATA EXPUNGED].

When the button on SCP-XXXX is pressed, a small door opens on the top face of the cube. Inside is a miniature version of the room SCP-XXXX is contained in, complete with a miniature version of SCP-XXXX. Pressing the button on the miniature SCP-XXXX causes the door to close and the miniature to disappear. The process can be repeated an infinite number of times.

The miniature versions of the room and SCP-XXXX are exact replicas, down to the smallest detail. However, the rooms and SCP-XXXXs inside the replicas are not exact replicas, and are instead random variations. The replicas are also inhabited by miniature versions of the personnel who were in the room when the button was pressed, which are also random variations.

It is unknown how SCP-XXXX creates the replicas, or how it is able to store them inside itself.
[[/div]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Reviews â–¡" hide="â–£ Reviews â–£"]]
[[<]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
A fun short read of horrific implications.
[[>]]
- [[*user LORDXVNV]]
[[/>]]
----
short, sweet, and silly. this is exact kind of skip i love
[[>]]
- [[*user froghopper]]
[[/>]]
[[/div]]
[[/<]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

----

[[=]]
++ [[[SCP-6558]]] - Word Disassociation
[[module ListPages name="SCP-6558"]]
++ **[##Green|+%%rating%%##]**
[[/module]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Commentary â–¡" hide="â–£ Commentary â–£"]]
Ever since Fishish posted the first thing for the Department of Unreality I've wanted to write something for it! I was trying to think of what to use for it for the longest time, and then finally, I thought "What about pattern Screamers? They seem similar!" and boom! I clipped parts from SCPs I loved and made a really fun meta cross-link heavy scip!
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Reviews â–¡" hide="â–£ Reviews â–£"]]
[[<]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
I dig this.
[[>]]
- [[*user Siddartha Alonne]]
[[/>]]
----
I liked the article in its idea and execution
[[>]]
- [[*user Space Diamond]]
[[/>]]
[[/div]]
[[/<]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

----

[[=]]
++ [[[SCP-5847]]] - The Food's Court
[[module ListPages name="SCP-5847"]]
++ **[##Green|+%%rating%%##]**
[[/module]]

[[collapsible show="â–¡ Commentary â–¡" hide="â–£ Commentary â–£"]]
First of all, this was my first SCP. 

Secondly, yes. This is 100% a thinly veiled excuse 
to make tons of food puns.

Thirdly, I had made this as a Level for the Backrooms Wiki at first but halfway through I realized the meat of the article was the audio log so I ported that over and added some set-up for it.
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Reviews â–¡" hide="â–£ Reviews â–£"]]
[[<]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
I love the sense of pure chaos this creates
[[>]]
- [[*user LemonBee12]]
[[/>]]
----
I donut enjoy this, this is the wurst article of all thyme. What have you done to miso?
[[>]]
- [[*user Fish^12]]
[[/>]]
----
This isâ€¦this is ridiculous. In a good way. To have this sheer number of puns, and for none of them to feel forced is impressive. Procharcuterie is a marvel.
[[>]]
- [[*user Dysadron]]
[[/>]]
[[/div]]
[[/<]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

----

[[=]]
++ [[[SCP-6552]]] - Tidal.wav
[[module ListPages name="SCP-6552"]]
++ **[##Green|+%%rating%%##]**
[[/module]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Commentary â–¡" hide="â–£ Commentary â–£"]]
At only 250 words, this is the shortest thing I've written. I wrote this all in one go in just under an hour. It was amazingly fun to write! I came up with the title and then an hour later, I had a really fun article!
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Reviews â–¡" hide="â–£ Reviews â–£"]]
[[<]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
The article's simplicity and fine line between silliness and horror work really well.
[[>]]
- [[*user OrbeezTertius]]
[[/>]]
----
Now this is great. Articles like this are hard to come, especially ones done as well as this
[[>]]
- [[*user Ruskied]]
[[/>]]
----
Simple, but has a lot of charm to it +1 :)
[[>]]
- [[*user Bread_Tyrant]]
[[/>]]
[[/div]]
[[/<]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

----

[[=]]
++ [[[SCP-6588]]] - Sugar High
[[module ListPages name="scp-6588"]]
++ **[##Green|+%%rating%%##]**
[[/module]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Commentary â–¡" hide="â–£ Commentary â–£"]]
I made a bet with a [[*user DolphinSlugchugger]] that I could write an article using a photo I took of a Sour Patch Gummy that looked pregnant. As you can tell. I won.
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Reviews â–¡" hide="â–£ Reviews â–£"]]
[[<]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
What is it with you people and sour patch kids?

Bizarre and uncomfy but well-written enough I've gotta hand it to you.
[[>]]
- [[*user Gnomedome]]
[[/>]]
----
mpreg sour patch kids lets gooooooooooooooooo
[[>]]
- [[*user RosySaturniidae]]
[[/>]]
----
What in the hell did I just read?
[[>]]
- [[*user QuestioningEspecialy]]
[[/>]]
[[/div]]
[[/<]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
++ [[[SCP-1551-EX]]] - SeÃ±or Pig

[[/module]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Commentary â–¡" hide="â–£ Commentary â–£"]]
First ever explained mister babyyyyy!!!

I actually came up with the idea for this one almost a year ago, and never found a good angle past the basic "Mr. Fish but opposite"

bro, that pig didn't deserve that :(

[[=]]
++ [[[SCP-6554]]] - Blind Box Toy Machines
[[module ListPages name="SCP-6554"]]
++ **[##Green|+%%rating%%##]**
[[/module]]

[[collapsible show="â–¡ Commentary â–¡" hide="â–£ Commentary â–£"]]
This is my attempt at a short SCP that doesn't fully explain its story. I've given you the clues but I hope you figure out the story yourself!
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Reviews â–¡" hide="â–£ Reviews â–£"]]
[[<]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
It took me way too long to realize what was going on. I had to read the article over and over again, and I felt stupid now that I've finally figured it out.
[[>]]
- [[*user Justheretosay]]
[[/>]]
----
I think my favorite part of this is the lack of sideways "N"s in the writing, along with the other strange items.
[[>]]
- [[*user Scorpion451]]
[[/>]]
[[/div]]
[[/<]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

--------

[[=]]
++ [[[SCP-5722]]] - Lonely Echoes in Footnotes
[[>]]
A rewrite for [[*user Cryer Walker]]
[[/>]]
[[module ListPages name="scp-5722"]]
++ **[##Green|+%%rating%%##]**
[[/module]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Commentary â–¡" hide="â–£ Commentary â–£"]]
When I first read SCP-5722, I really loved the character, but I felt it wasn't given a satisfying conclusion. I also thought it would be a great chance to sneak in my Author Avatar :P
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]
[[=]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Reviews â–¡" hide="â–£ Reviews â–£"]]
[[<]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
This was just a fun article. It's cute and executed well. But, personally, I would let Jeff freely roam the SCP wiki.
[[>]]
- [[*user DrApricus]]
[[/>]]
----
Absolutely love this article, the interview and "Wait, are you talking to me" were my favorite part.
[[>]]
- [[*user BNova01]]
[[/>]]
----
Bizarre. Uncanny.
[[>]]
- [[*user Gnomedome]]
[[/>]]
[[/div]]
[[/<]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

----

[[=]]
++ [[[SCP-6553]]] - The One-Horned Demon
[[>]]
A collaboration with my dad!
[[/>]]
[[module ListPages name="SCP-6553"]]
++ **[##Green|+%%rating%%##]**
[[/module]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Commentary â–¡" hide="â–£ Commentary â–£"]]
I've been reading SCP articles to my dad since around 2018 and after I started writing them, I knew I wanted to get him to write one too. I finally ambushed him on a call one time and we wrote this out together. He contributed mainly to the effects of the fluids.
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Reviews â–¡" hide="â–£ Reviews â–£"]]
[[<]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
weird and awesome
[[>]]
- [[*user sw1ff]]
[[/>]]
----
I can't stop laughing at "any subject who ingests the fluid will become well-known in their hometown as having murdered someone." Just something about the astounding pettiness contrasted with the power of the object just makes for comedy gold in my book.
[[>]]
- [[*user Gaffsey]]
[[/>]]
----
Honey rainbows with weird effects are oddly fascinating
[[>]]
- [[*user Void Xenon]]
[[/>]]
[[/div]]
[[/<]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

----

[[=]]
++ [[[SCP-6868]]] - Bubbly Bobby the Rubber Ducky
[[>]]
A rewrite for [[*user cremo]]
[[/>]]
[[module ListPages name="SCP-6868"]]
++ **[##Green|+%%rating%%##]**
[[/module]]

[[collapsible show="â–¡ Commentary â–¡" hide="â–£ Commentary â–£"]]
I really liked the concept of a rubber duck who has been scarred from inadvertently killing anyone that tries to hang out with it, so when cremo first posted this and it got downvoted, I jumped on rewriting it. It seems like people have enjoyed it now given it's currently my most upvoted article on the wiki!

This was my first attempt at horror. I tried out fridge horror with the realization this duck was discarded because a father accidentally killed his child by sending them a very unfinished prototype. 
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Reviews â–¡" hide="â–£ Reviews â–£"]]
[[<]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
Interesting throwback to series II-III. Simple anomaly, simple execution, throw in a POI, unexpected result.
[[>]]
- [[*user Celare]]
[[/>]]
----
Babe wake up new tstaffor skip droppedâ€¦

wait don't touch that purple rubber duc-

NOOOOOO
[[>]]
- [[*user LAN 2D]]
[[/>]]
----
I must have a dark sense of humor because this just made me laugh my ass off
[[>]]
- [[*user Grigori Karpin]]
[[/>]]
----
Got to the end of the description and wasnâ€™t quite sure where this one was going. Itâ€™s a good example of the narrative and the main hook of the article being quite separate from the core anomaly. Thereâ€™s a nice bit of fridge logic with the fear of humans, and the texts are a good way to tell this story.
[[>]]
- [[*user Dysadron]]
[[/>]]
[[/div]]
[[/<]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

----

[[=]]
++ [[[SCP-6067]]] - Recyclone
[[module ListPages name="SCP-6067"]]
++ **[##Green|+%%rating%%##]**
[[/module]]

[[collapsible show="â–¡ Commentary â–¡" hide="â–£ Commentary â–£"]]
I //hate// that stupid, horrible, no-good, infuriating, fake cheery voice from every kids commercial ever. This is my parody of that to see how far a commercial could go with that voice with its stupid happy sound still talking over it.
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Reviews â–¡" hide="â–£ Reviews â–£"]]
[[<]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
This is really good. The Funtastic logo in particular is great.
[[>]]
- [[*user LemonBee12]]
[[/>]]
----
Saw this in the IRC, just as good then as it is now.
[[>]]
- [[*user GreenGolem]]
[[/>]]
----
I can just imagine if someone went to Funtastic and said something like "a cyclone isn't a hole", they'd probably be countered with 'its circular thing that other things fall into, yes?' is just hole in the air' or something like that.

Anyway yeah, definitely +1.
[[>]]
- [[*user RealSurrealSir]]
[[/>]]
[[/div]]
[[/<]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

----

[[=]]
++ [[[SCP-3837]]] - Maize Knight
[[>]]
A Collaboration with [[*user PlaguePJP]]
[[/>]]
[[module ListPages name="SCP-3837"]]
++ **[##Green|+%%rating%%##]**
[[/module]]

[[collapsible show="â–¡ Commentary â–¡" hide="â–£ Commentary â–£"]]
My first collaboration! 
It was wonderful working with Plague. He brought tons of great ideas to the table and this wouldn't be what it is today without him.

This is a rewrite of the previous Corn Goblin by [[*user BaronJoe]]. It didn't have much for a narrative so we've added quite a bit of story. 

Also, I just have to quickly take full credit for the GoI Goat of Interest line.
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Reviews â–¡" hide="â–£ Reviews â–£"]]
[[<]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
instant upvote for "goat of interest"
[[>]]
- [[*user alexpine]]
[[/>]]
----
> goat of interest

Pretty sure this is a cognitohazard that makes people upvote.
[[>]]
- [[*user Fish^12]]
[[/>]]
----
ðŸ
[[>]]
- [[*user BoredDog]]
[[/>]]
[[/div]]
[[/<]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[=]]
++ [[[SCP-6389]]] - Sculptor-Hypnos
[[>]]
A Collaboration with [[*user Agisuru]]
[[/>]]
[[module ListPages name="SCP-6389"]]
++ **[##Green|+%%rating%%##]**
[[/module]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Commentary â–¡" hide="â–£ Commentary â–£"]]
I was initially approached to critique this. After reading through it, I really loved it and offered to contribute to it. I'm glad I did as it was tons of fun working with Agi, and creating weird anomalies such as the giant sea cucumbers with mouths along their backs!
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Reviews â–¡" hide="â–£ Reviews â–£"]]
[[<]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
Pretty quality article with an interesting anomaly. Bravo!
[[>]]
- [[*user DrApricus]]
[[/>]]
[[/div]]
[[/<]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

----

[[=]]
++ [[[SCP-6551]]] - Clockwork Lullaby
[[module ListPages name="SCP-6551"]]
++ **[##Green|+%%rating%%##]**
[[/module]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Commentary â–¡" hide="â–£ Commentary â–£"]]
I've really enjoyed [[*user Weryllium]]'s work so I wanted to write in that same style. There's a loose story here, but the main focus is just an interesting clockwork bird, and how it works!
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

----

[[=]]
++ [[[SCP-6226]]] - Duck Boat
[[module ListPages name="SCP-6226"]]
++ **[##Green|+%%rating%%##]**
[[/module]]

[[collapsible show="â–¡ Commentary â–¡" hide="â–£ Commentary â–£"]]
I have conquered List Pages!!!

Not much to say about this one, it's half SCP half WWS Format. 
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Reviews â–¡" hide="â–£ Reviews â–£"]]
[[<]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
Yet another short-form article. But I can upvote it solely because it's a sentient rowboat.
[[>]]
- [[*user andromedaz]]
[[/>]]

This got a laugh out of me. This also conveys the relationship dynamic between SCPF and WWS that I hadn't realized I always wanted.
[[>]]

[[/>]]
----
Okay, this made me laugh more than it should have. Nice job.
[[>]]
- [[*user MoreMuffins]]
[[/>]]
[[/div]]
[[/<]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
++ [[[SCP-5846-J]]]

++ **[##Green|+%%rating%%##]**

Eh, it's alright. Though, the whole "Department of Popcorn" thing really ruined the article for me.

Gonna novote for now.

[[>]]

++ [[[SCP-555-J]]] - Squid Mop

[[collapsible show="â–¡ Commentary â–¡" hide="â–£ Commentary â–£"]]
Funni mop

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="+SCP" hide="-SCP"]]

[[/module]]

[[tab Tales]]
[[=]]
++ [[[Log of Non-Anomalous Items]]]
[[module ListPages name="Log of Non-Anomalous Items"]]
++ **[##Green|+%%rating%%##]**
[[/module]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Commentary â–¡" hide="â–£ Commentary â–£"]]
I jokingly said "what if there was a log of //non//-anomalous objects?" in a Discord server one time... and here we are!
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Reviews â–¡" hide="â–£ Reviews â–£"]]
[[<]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
Honestly, I laughed at the title of this, which is enough for me to upvote.
[[>]]

[[/>]]

this is fucking hilarious
[[>]]

[[>]]

This is so stupid. 10/10

tstaffor has once again made my laugh till I cry, love this so much lmao

[[/<]]

----

[[=]]
++ [[[SCP-173 But...]]]
[[module ListPages name="scp-173-but"]]
[[>]]
A Collaboration with [[*user Dr Trintavon]]
[[/>]]
++ **[##Green|+%%rating%%##]**
[[/module]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Commentary â–¡" hide="â–£ Commentary â–£"]]
I had so much fun writing this. I just sat in a voice call with [[*user Dr Trintavon]] for 4 hours and we wrote this entire thing. It was like a fever dream.
[[/collapsible]]

[[=]]
++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goat-vr-more-like-goat-very-bad-game Goat VR? More like Goat VeRy bad game!]
[[module ListPages name="Goat VR? More like Goat VeRy bad game!"]]
++ **[##Green|+%%rating%%##]**
[[/module]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Commentary â–¡" hide="â–£ Commentary â–£"]]
This is my attempt at [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/forum/t-1468460/ Dexanote's challenge]. I was pretty surprised to not be able to find any tales written like a video game review so I thought I'd write it myself!

The idea of this reviewer barely making it out of Goat VR alive and then going online to complain about it a bunch is a really funny concept to me.

[[=]]
++ [[[Herman Fuller Presents: Shapes the Clown]]]
[[module ListPages name="shapes-the-clown"]]
++ **[##Green|+%%rating%%##]**
[[/module]]
[[collapsible show="â–¡ Commentary â–¡" hide="â–£ Commentary â–£"]]
After reading through the entire catalog of Herman Fuller GoI formats, I realized they mostly followed the same gimmick of Herman abusing the act in question and the author of the book feeling bad for the act. I decided to write a format screw of the concept where the article's main focus is not the act featured on the poster but a different one entirely and Herman would like the act and the author would be the one to hate it.
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]
